DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate association pre-existing microalbuminuria contrast-induced acute kidney injury ( CIAKI ) follow coronary angiography ( CAG ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients eGFRâ‰¥30ml/min without macroalbuminuria undergo CAG . Pregnancy Lactation Allergic history contrast medium Having receive contrast medium within 7 day Use nephrotoxic medication within 7 day eGFR < 30 ml/min , macroalbuminuria ( ACR > 300 mg/g ) Renal transplantation , emergent coronary angiography Cardiogenic shock , pulmonary edema Use intraaortic balloon pump ( IABP ) mechanical ventilation Multiple myeloma malignant tumor Life expectancy le 12 month
